meanings.definition: A natural insecticide derived from chrysanthemum flowers.
meanings.sent1: The gardeners sprayed pyrethrins to protect their plants from bugs.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use pyrethrins to keep insects away from their crops.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrels thought the pyrethrins were a new type of flower food.
meanings.sent4: The pyrethrins acted like a shield, repelling all unwanted pests from the garden.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of pyrethrins filled the air, warding off any insects that dared to come close.

meanings.definition: A group of organic compounds found in certain plants, used for pest control.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are studying the effectiveness of different plants' pyrethrins in repelling insects.
meanings.sent2: The company developed a new pesticide using pyrethrins as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent3: The pyrethrins in the garden seemed to have a secret meeting, plotting against the bugs.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like pyrethrins, driving away any doubts that lingered in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The pyrethrins' power to deter pests amazed the farmers, leading to a bountiful harvest.

meanings.definition: The active ingredient in many insect repellents.
meanings.sent1: Before going camping, make sure to apply insect repellent with pyrethrins to avoid bites.
meanings.sent2: The hikers sprayed themselves with a pyrethrins-based repellent to keep mosquitoes at bay.
meanings.sent3: The mosquitoes, after encountering pyrethrins, decided to find a different picnic to bother.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like pyrethrins, keeping negativity away from her goals.
meanings.sent5: The pyrethrins in the spray formed an invisible barrier, protecting the campers from insect intruders.
